ResourceHeader.Description: The SuperMAG program involves a collaboration of more than 200 ground geomagnetic observatories coordinated by JHU/APL. A heterogenous ensemble of ground station data are made homogeneous by conversions to a common time resolution (1 min) and a common coordinate system (NEZ), by baseline removal, and by data cleanings. Resultant data are intended for studies of varying ionospheric and magnetospheric current systems.
